title: Savage Circus Dreamland Manor +1
description:
Thanks to wikipedia.orge for the info!!!!

Savage Circus is a German/Swedish power metal band originally created as a side project by Thomen Stauch before leaving Blind Guardian



Biography:

Savage Circus began when Stauch asked his friend Piet Sielck if he was interested in joining Thomen&#039;s new project, which he was. Piet then introduced a Swedish band called Persuader to Thomen. Thomen liked the band and also liked the fact that the vocalist sounded very much like Hansi K?rsch. Thomen immediately said that he wanted to have Jens Carlsson (singer of Persuader) in the band. Jens brought with him Persuader guitarist Emil Norberg. Their debut album, Dreamland Manor was released in August of 2005. Thomen Stauch was fired from the band on August 17, 2007, due to his frail health, leading to the cancellations of many shows. In September 2007, Mike Terrana joined the band as the new drummer. At the same time Yenz Leonhardt became a full member of the band. The release of the Dreamland Manor&#039;s follow-up is expected in early 2008.

The musical style is similar to both Blind Guardian and Persuader but does also contain some elements of Iron Savior, due to Piet Sielck&#039;s writing. But, the band has a power ballad "Beyond Reality" on their debut album Dreamland Manor.


Line-up:

Current members:

Jens Carlsson ? lead vocals 
Emil Norberg ? guitars 
Piet Sielck ? guitars, backing vocals 
Yenz Leonhardt ? bass, backing vocals 
Mike Terrana ? drums, percussion 

Former members:

Thomas "Thomen" Stauch ? drums 

Discography:

Studio albums:

Dreamland Manor (2005) 
Forthcoming 2nd album (2008) 

DVDs:

Live in Atlanta (2007)
